Game.Name: Caesar no Yabou II (Japan)
Game.plot: Warrior of Rome II is a Strategy game, developed and published by Micronet,which was released in Japan in 1992.Cheat: Tug of war modeTo access a secret tug of war mode, start a new game, and press start. Go to Load Data, and put the cursor on the right edge of the box. Hold start on the second controller, and press A on controller one. Then press start on controller one. To play, repeatedly tap the C button.
